Item.Value: Oh, you're $^$ right? I'm $0$. You're here for adventure, right? Good! I'm a ranger in these parts, I know the landscape like the back of my hand. Bring me any adventure maps you find, and I'll make sure you get there.
Hello, $^$, Care for a drink? You'll have to bring your own I'm afraid!
Do you have any adventure maps? It's been a while since I've gone exploring.
Really? For me? You shouldn't have! Well, I'll keep this in mind next time we go out and exploring.
Greetings! What can I do for you today, &^&? [Talk:Talk|Hire Adventurers:BuyWorkers]
